arts.ttl: Napoli keeps up pressure on Serie A leader Inter with 2-1 win over Fiorentina
arts.sum: Giovanni Di Lorenzo hit the crossbar for Napoli as Fiorentina had De Gea to thank for a number of impressive saves that kept it in the match. Napoli kept up the pressure on Serie A leader Inter Milan as it finally got back to winning ways with a 2-1 victory over Fiorentina on Sunday.
